channel.title: Kateiso Blog
channel.description: Essays and notes on intelligent creative systems

item.title: Designing for Emergent Storytelling
item.description: What interaction design can borrow from game design and speculative fiction to build adaptive narratives.

item.title: Installing Comet on Windows with Clash Proxy
item.description: Install Comet reliably behind Clash for Windows by running the installer through temporary PowerShell proxy variables and avoiding common connection pitfalls.

item.title: Orchestrating Creative Systems with AI Copilots
item.description: A systems-first approach to working with AI tools, making space for human intuition while automating the heavy lift.

item.title: Prototyping with Generative Media
item.description: A starter toolkit for blending generative visuals, audio, and text into rapid prototyping cycles.
